content: आबाधः {@--1@} Affliction, injury, trouble, molestation, damage; न प्राणाबाधमाचरेत् <ls>Ms. 4. 54</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 4.">51.</ls> {@--2@} Interruption, hinderance. {@--3@} Attack (<ab>Ved.</ab>). --धा {@--1@} Pain, distress. {@--2@} Mental agony or anguish. {@--3@} Segment of the base of a triangle.
